sentences.en: Although the terms are often used interchangeably, they are different.
sentences.cn: 虽然这两个术语经常可以互换, 但是他们是不一样的.

sentences.en: Artists use & quot ; paint & quot ; and & quot ; pigment & quot ; interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 画家们即用“油漆 ” 也用“颜料 ”.

sentences.en: Bit, byte and character are often used interchangeably. 8 bits equal 1 byte, or a character.
sentences.cn: 位, 字节,和字符通常可以互换. 8位等于1字节或1字符.

sentences.en: Despite the apparent clarity around the distinct origins and meaning of the caduceus and the staff of aesculapius, they are both used commonly, and of ten interchangeably, every day.
sentences.cn: 虽然关于克丢西尔斯杖和阿斯克勒皮亚斯杖的起源和意义很明显是截然不同的，可它们每天都被频繁使用，而且经常被相互替换。

sentences.en: The author in the EPA article confused two very different terms and is using them interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 作者在环保署的文章中,混淆两个差别很大的术语并且将他们互换使用.

sentences.en: The terms document and file are often interchangeably.
sentences.cn: “文档”和“文件”这两个词往往会互换使用.

sentences.en: The terms master model , pattern and plug are sometimes used interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 术语“原模,基模,阳模”有时是可互换的.

sentences.en: The terms rack and cabinet are often used interchangeably, which is incorrect.
sentences.cn: 机架和机箱这两个术语常常互换着用, 这是错误的.

sentences.en: The terms vector and array will be used interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 术语矢量和矩阵会被交替地使用.

sentences.en: The two terms are often used interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 这两个术语常常互换使用.

sentences.en: The two words are used interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 这两个单词可交换使用.

sentences.en: These expressions are often used interchangeably, but they do have different meanings.
sentences.cn: 这些表达方式经常相互替代使用，但它们的含义却有所不同。

sentences.en: These terms can be used interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 这些术语可以交替使用.

sentences.en: These two words are identical in meaning and can be used interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 这两个词意义相同,可以互用.

sentences.en: These two words can be used interchangeably.
This book will use the interchangeably.
sentences.cn: 本书中,两者可交替使用.

words.tran_cn: 可互换的；可交换的；可交替的
